statements: SELECT * FROM quest_missions WHERE quest_id = 1;
SELECT mission_id, objective FROM quest_missions WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT quest_id, objective, completion_status FROM quest_missions WHERE mission_id = 3;
SELECT mission_id, objective, completion_status FROM quest_missions WHERE quest_id = 2 AND completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT quest_id, mission_id, objective, completion_status FROM quest_missions WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT quest_id, mission_id, objective, completion_status FROM quest_missions WHERE quest_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM quest_missions WHERE mission_id = 5 ORDER BY quest_id DESC;
SELECT objective FROM quest_missions WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT quest_id, mission_id FROM quest_missions WHERE objective LIKE 'Collect%';
SELECT * FROM quest_missions WHERE quest_id = 2 AND mission_id BETWEEN 3 AND 6;
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE quest_id = 1
SELECT quest_name, completion_status FROM quests ORDER BY quest_id DESC
SELECT mission_id, mission_name FROM missions WHERE completion_status = FALSE
SELECT quest_name, quest_description, completion_status FROM quests
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM missions WHERE mission_id > 10 ORDER BY mission_name DESC
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE quest_id = 4
SELECT mission_name, completion_status FROM missions WHERE mission_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM quests INNER JOIN missions ON quests.quest_id = missions.mission_id
SELECT * FROM quests;
SELECT quest_name, completion_status FROM quests WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT mission_name, mission_description FROM missions WHERE mission_id = 5;
SELECT objective_name, objective_description FROM objectives WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT quest_id, quest_name, completion_status FROM quests ORDER BY quest_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM quests WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE quest_id = 1;
SELECT mission_name, mission_description FROM missions WHERE completion_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM objectives WHERE objective_name LIKE '%explore%';
SELECT quest_name, mission_name, objective_name FROM quests, missions, objectives WHERE quests.quest_id = missions.mission_id AND missions.mission_id = objectives.objective_id;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT quest_name, completion_status FROM quests WHERE completion_status = 1;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name FROM missions ORDER BY mission_name ASC;
SELECT objective_description FROM objectives WHERE completion_status = 0;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, level FROM players WHERE level > 5;
SELECT quest_name, missions.mission_name, completion_status FROM quests JOIN missions ON quests.quest_id = missions.quest_id;
SELECT objective_description, completion_status FROM objectives WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT * FROM quests;
SELECT quest_name, quest_description FROM quests WHERE completion_status='completed';
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT mission_name, mission_description FROM missions WHERE quest_id=1;

SELECT player_name, quest_name, mission_name, progress_status FROM players JOIN quests ON players.player_id=player_progress.player_id JOIN missions ON player_progress.mission_id=missions.mission_id WHERE progress_status='in progress';
SELECT * FROM quests;
SELECT quest_name, completion_status FROM quests WHERE completion_status='not started';
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, quest_name FROM missions JOIN quests ON missions.quest_id = quests.quest_id;

SELECT player_name, quest_name, mission_name, progress_status FROM player_progress JOIN players ON player_progress.player_id = players.player_id JOIN quests ON player_progress.quest_id = quests.quest_id JOIN missions ON player_progress.mission_id = missions.mission_id;
